Project & Contribution

atom-i18n

Atom Package for translating Atom into any language.
Currently it supports 12 languages.
Translation is driven by community.

atom/tree-view

Extend functionality of Atom core module: tree view.
This contribution includes Jasmine spec.
Merged by Atom official in version 1.12.

ToDo List using MEAN

A simple todo list app using MEAN stack with RESTful style API.
It is integrated with Travis CI testing API using Mocha.
It is deployed on Heroku.
